td.content: s:pt c/o 6 weeks h/o severe difficulty reading, severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, severe poor night vision and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. NKDA. patient is a female aged 65 years. consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 151 cm, Weight 80.6 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:pt presents with severe poor night vision, severe difficulty reading, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. she has history of severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye. she is a white f retired aged 65 yrs. patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption denies any smoking o:Height 151 cm, Weight 80.8 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 15 a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments.

s:a 66 yr old female retired presents with severe gradual decrease in visual field in the left eye, severe poor night vision, severe difficulty reading and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for past 9 days. o:Height 151 cm, Weight 80.5 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17, Full-Field Electroretinogram nearly extinguished signal in both eye a:Retinitis Pigmentosa p:administered vitamin A - 50000 IU see comments, performed Full-Field Electroretinogram, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
